item.title: The Creator Multi-Tool That’s Blowing Up The Internet
item.description: Hacksmith’s new multi-tool proves creators can build more than audiences. With $7.4M raised and two weeks to go, the internet is paying attention.

item.title: Measles Outbreak In Texas Has Officially Ended, But The Threat Remains
item.description: Texas Department of State Health Services announced that the measles outbreak affecting the state has ended. But they noted that the threat remains.
